Expert in React/Next.js, real-time systems, AI integration, and scalable enterprise solutions.

keyAchievements: Built complex multi-tenant WhatsApp Business platform with AI integration and real-time messaging capabilities
Developed enterprise Chrome extension with advanced UI components and browser API integrations
Implemented cloud infrastructure using AWS, Terraform, and containerized deployments
Created scalable social media management platform with payment processing and SSO authentication
Built vector search systems with OpenAI integration for intelligent content processing
Deployed production systems handling real-time notifications and multi-platform integrations

testimonials.testimonial:
Raj transformed our vision into a stunning reality for Kairos Club.
His expertise and dedication shone through, delivering a website that brilliantly captures our essence. The seamless blend of design and functionality showcases his talent.
We wholeheartedly recommend him for his exceptional work and commitment to excellence. Thank you for elevating our online presence.
